package.name: MediaBar
package.shortDescription: Control your music directly from the HomeBar.

descriptionlist.description:
MediaBar makes your Home bar more useful, but not intrusive. The MediaBar adds a tiny media player and also turns your Home bar into a music play indicator along with controls, so with quick access to pause and scroll back and forth, you can have complete control over your music.
You can customize the MediaBar to your liking, such as width and fade speed.
MediaBar works in all applications and on your Home screen.
Designed to work only with HomeBar compatible devices.
